name: The Good Food Institute Europe (Belgium)
memberOrga: We do not have member organisations.
goal: The Good Food Institute Europe is a non-profit organisation working to build a sustainable, healthy, and just food system. We are harnessing the power of food innovation to accelerate the transition of the worldâ€™s food system to plant-based and cell-based meat, eggs, and dairy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
- We are engaging with partners in the EU institutions to make the case for Research and Development funding, for example from the forthcoming Horizon Europe programme, to support the development of plant- and cell-based meat, eggs, dairy and seafood.

- We are engaging with partners in the EU institutions in relation to the naming, labelling and denomination of plant-based food products. In particular, we are engaging in relation to proposals on food labelling contained in Working Document - COM (2018) 394 - 2018/0218 (COD) - Article 1 Amendments to the Regulation 1308/2013

- We plan to engage with partners to ensure a fair and evidence-based approach to the regulation of plant- and cell-based food in the EU.
